name: Legend of the Maple Forest
description:
You are the healer from the small village of Hutong, living a quiet life surrounded by the forest of Maple trees that support you with their healing properties. But the lingering threat of a demon invasion looms ever so close. 

The Game:

This is a short and a bit cheesy BL romance game created for Yaoi Jam 2021. 

Featuring:

  • Around 8000 words
  • 4 potential love interests
  • 4 CGs

Credits

  • Story / Code - malasoup
  • Art - Lucy
  • Music by Abstraction - abstractionmusic.com
  • Background images - Pixabay, Pexels

First time creating something like this, it ended up being a bit rushed so it's a little messy. Some things we didn't have time to add so we might go back and make some fixes. 

Love Interests
